reviewText:
Only one comment - they got a "historian" who doesn't even know the correct side who laid a siege to Vienna! Such basic information is widely available (and a quick check by the editor would have found the error, and the imposter historian)
He says it was the Arabs where in reality it was the Ottoman Turks.  Mixing the two people might be common, but surely a historian would know better.
Makes one wonder whether the other info is correct...
